item.description:
Thursday, October 7, 6:30 PM
Guitarist Joe Carter and Bassist David Finck
will be performing selections from their CD collaboration, Both Sides of the Equator, scheduled for release in 2011, the title referring to songs included on the CD from both South and North America. Bassist This is Joe's third performance at the Art center. David comes in from NYC for his first appearance. David Finck has long been recognized as one of New York’s most gifted musicians, performing and recording with everyone from Rosemary Clooney, Linda Eder and Peter Cincotti to Paquito D’Rivera, Steve Kuhn and Claudio Roditi, to name just a few. In the words of Sir Andre Previn, “There is no one who is as good a Jazz bass player and collaborator”. Suggested donation $10/door.
http://www.joecarterm...
item.how_to_find_us: meet in the entrance, will have that bw scarf with piano keys
item.name: Guitarist Joe Carter and Bassist David Finck
